message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take 1000 and we'll be done.
I'm willing to split it down the middle, Alice. Let's be fair.
Okay, Bob. I'm still feeling generous.  Let's split it 60/40 this time.  It's a win-win, and we can be done with this.
I'm not sure why you're being so generous, Alice. I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share this time. Let's try 60/40 in my favor.
